name: ELECTRIC THUNDER TIGER II
description:
READ BELOW

(ALL RIGHTS TO GRASSHOPPER MANUFACTURE, PLEASE UNDERSTAND. TWITTER @MELONKOI FOR CONTACT)

CONTROLS (KEYBOARD / CONTROLER)

THESE ATTACKS WILL REHCHARGE YOUR BATTERY

--{JUMP, WALL JUMP} - SPACE, H / A                         {JUMP ON ENEMIES}

--{DASH} ELECTRONIC SHOOTING STAR - J / X            {DASH THROUGH ENEMIES}

---DASH AFTER A KILL TO TRAVEL FARTHER

THESE ATTACKS WILL NOT REHCARGE YOUR BATTERY, USE CAREFULLY

--INDISCRIMINATE SHOT - K / Y {AFTER 1ST BOSS}

--BIG CANNON - JUMP MID AIR {AFTER 2ND BOSS}

--HYPERBOLIC FIELD - L / X {AFTER 3RD BOSS}

ENTER / START - START

TAB / SELECT - TOGGLE TV
